title: Android 12L rolling out to Google Pixel phones starting today
content:
Google hasn’t released a minor update for Android in years, instead sticking to yearly major updates and fixing bugs throughout the year in the monthly security updates. However, Google is returning to that idea with the release of Android 12L, which mainly focuses on improvements for foldables and other large-screen devices. After months of beta

The post Android 12L rolling out to Google Pixel phones starting today appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has officially released Android 12, and it's rolling out to Pixel devices as the March Feature Drop.
